p.span: By order of the Governor, Scott County Central Schools will remain closed for the remainder of the academic school year.

strong.span: Scott County Central Food Service Update:

span.br:
Meals for both Thursday, April 9th and Friday April 10th will be delivered together on Thursday, April 9th. Breakfast for Monday, April 13th will also be included with the Thursday drop- offs.
There will be NO deliveries on Friday, April 10th or Wednesday, April 13th.
